name: Box Pushing Game (WIP)
description:
Do you like pushing things? Walking? What about boxes? Then I have a game for you!
Created entirely from scratch (including art assets) in C++ with a custom engine, this is Box Pushing Game!

Made to test the waters with my engine, this game serves as an example of what can be done with it in its current state.

A simple game where your objective is to push as many boxes as possible into their spot!

Currently in development, and only plays until level 5.

If there is enough interest, I will open up the project to donations.

Feedback appreciated!

Instructions to play Installation

Download the files for your operating system/device, and follow the README.txt included in the .zip package.

Windows

Download the Windows build below (most of the time you just want the x64 version, BoxPushingGame_Win64.zip, if that doesn't work use the 32 bit build), open the zip file, extract, and then run Thruster2.exe.

Linux

(Coming soon)

Sony PSP

(Coming soon)

Gameplay

At the menu, press start or space to begin. Gamepads are supported. Then progress through the levels, putting boxes into their respective places. Don't let the score drop below zero!

At the last level (currently level 5) after completing the level, it will display a level complete screen. Pressing space will restart the level. This is a known issue and will be addressed in a later version.

Fullscreen can be toggled by pressing F11. Supports dynamic resolutions.
